action_title: Protect brownfield or ex-industrial sites in urban areas
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects of protecting brownfield or ex-industrial sites in urban areas. This study was in the UK.

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
POPULATION RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
BEHAVIOUR (1 STUDY)

Use (1 study): One study in the UKÂ reported that an ex-industrial site that was protected was occupied by up to four species of reptiles.
